title: Looking for this dotted font version
content:
Hi,

I am looking for this cool dotted font:  
 [http://www.toanvuhuu.com/fileadmin/work/CV\_Toan\_Vu-Huu\_12-03.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020232339/http:/www.toanvuhuu.com/fileadmin/work/CV_Toan_Vu-Huu_12-03.pdf "http://www.toanvuhuu.com/fileadmin/work/CV\_Toan\_Vu-Huu\_12-03.pdf")

The small „i“ looks very specific to me? Has anybody an idea what is? I already tried to contact the person myself but did not get an answer.

Many thanks.

Best,  
Dani
author: danilenja

comments.content:
It seems it’s a custom version of B-Dot.  
 [http://www.andrebaldinger.com/hp.php?item.14&open=1](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020232339/http:/www.andrebaldinger.com/hp.php?item.14&open=1 "http://www.andrebaldinger.com/hp.php?item.14&open=1")

EDIT:  
It’s a new version of it.  
 [http://www.andrebaldinger.com/plakate.php?item.1&cat=0&dir=003\_type\_b-do...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020232339/http:/www.andrebaldinger.com/plakate.php?item.1&cat=0&dir=003_type_b-dot&init_dir=0 "http://www.andrebaldinger.com/plakate.php?item.1&cat=0&dir=003\_type\_b-dot&init\_dir=0")
Wow, yes that's it. There's a BDot and a BLine. THX!
